content: @Jamie Jones @Anand Kulanthaivel - Hey, just wanted to confirm if you all will be able to complete this one in time to vote on it next Tuesday?

I've posted my end of the changes here - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15-ZOygJMR7Gdq5IwsEm0NWOQAaWfgA9IZp1lcjPfhjg

@Jamie Jones if you enter any relevant comments there I can consider/incorporate them. I can work on a two business day turnaround for anything. Also, the DiscussionIssues tab on that sheet may end up tabled (input appreciated).

@Jamie Jones - If we plan for a block vote on Tuesday, we probably need to send out today. I suppose we can inform the workgroup that we will discuss and vote on this tracker next Tuesday, which is probably fine since it is probably the only one to vote on?
@Jamie Jones - Any updates on this? Thoughts on voting on it by next Tuesday?

Finished my pass at updating component short definitions, please review at https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/branches/definitions-refresh/artifacts.html I think the snapshot tables are looking pretty good
First review looks great. Thanks for the hard work @Jamie Jones
@Jamie Jones - Following your patterns, I pushed up some additional changes ...
Do you think this is ready to vote on tomorrow?
Yes, I've got a disposition drafted to go over today, along with 35907 (though that one has an open question regarding RegionStudied)
I pushed an update to replace the LOINC pending message with the local code. I also updated a couple of other related QA items.

I created a pull request for anyone who wants to do a GitHub review. I would propose that unless there are questions/concerns, it will be merged to master in about 20 ish hours (beginning of my day tomorrow :smile:)
